name: The Devil's Heart
description:
Joshua has had a very interesting life.
Gifted with divine power at  young age, he has been the center focus of a various paranormal experiences throughout  his life. Upon losing his parents during his high school years, he found himself under the care of Brea, a canine furae who was a friend of the family. Now having grown to accept the tragic loss of life, he is ready to begin college with his best friend, Eli, a troubled youth who has had to deal with his own personal issues growing up. The problem is that, the world hasn't stopped to allow the two a moment to breath, thus they will soon find themselves coming face-to-face with even stranger paranormal activities, as the demons from the Netherrealm reach out for the mortal world, despite the vanguard of the Church of Divine Faith seeking to halt their advances.
Where will this put Joshua?
Come  and find out.
